title: Got suspended for saying the word %%%%%
body:
Game 1
Subject 5: Succ
Subject 5: Wat
Subject 5: Y
Subject 5: Ty %%%%%
Subject 5: Wolf camp 
Subject 5: Idk why an early game eve would attack an early game Shaco %%%%%
Subject 5: k.
Subject 5: XDDD
Subject 5: I ganked for you and you did legit nothing so
Subject 5: =L
Subject 5: Bot is responsive tho %%%%%
Subject 5: We need somebody to get sword
Subject 5: ?
Subject 5: Uhm lol
Subject 5: Uhm lol
Subject 5: gg

So I wasn't exactly being toxic, I remember the game going like this:

I was Eve, didn't want to gank but my team was spam pinging me. Shaco was talking shit in global chat, so I responded with: "Idk why an early game eve would attack an early game Shaco %%%%%." My bot lane got stomped on and fed about 15 kills, they blamed it on me because I couldn't gank for them while being 2 levels down. (Eve) 

I ended up muting them, and just playing some more games without even thinking of this being a problem. (Let's be real here, even the boondocks makes fun of people like this.)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fAtv9IW0mo0

So my feedback to this ban: Honestly, I fucking laughed. Like, I couldn't keep the snickering down in my public discord. This is a bot mistake, right? I know that the word %%%%% is a hot spot for bots, just seems like a duo took advantage of the way that the bot responds to reports and I got nipped. That's pretty much my only explanation, because I don't think any human being could be responsible for this.

replies.body:
What about your pre-game chat? And the fact that this is a trend for you in almost all of your game, pre-game lobbies and post-game lobbies.

Pre-game:
How many %%%%%%s does it take to make a %%%%%%, have a %%%%%%?
But you need to have a %%%%%% to make the other 2 %%%%%%s have a %%%%%%
But you need to have another one to make sure that the %%%%%% doesn't steal the other 2 %%%%%%s baby for rans
I'm an expert on %%%%%%s


Racism - We aren't cool with it.
This is the funniest thing I have read today

So yeah, any kind of racial slur (including those that are "lessened" by attempting to remove things such as the "hard r" or "hard t") is unacceptable in League. Those terms are highly offensive and the vast majority of the League community, as well as the plurality of the general population, considers them to be unacceptable in virtually all contexts. Of those contexts where it is acceptable to use such language, none of them include anything in a video game.

TLDR: Racial slurs are never acceptable in League. For any reason.

> [{quoted}](name=Chermorg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uyR21lrr,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-12-28T01:19:10.693+0000)
>
> So yeah, any kind of racial slur (including those that are "lessened" by attempting to remove things such as the "hard r" or "hard t") is unacceptable in League. Those terms are highly offensive and the vast majority of the League community, as well as the plurality of the general population, considers them to be unacceptable in virtually all contexts. Of those contexts where it is acceptable to use such language, none of them include anything in a video game.
> 
> TLDR: Racial slurs are never acceptable in League. For any reason.

I think it's about time I find a grown up game then, for grown ups to play, with an older populace.
I would think grown ups know when to use a term and when not to..... but -shrugs- to each their own :)

> [{quoted}](name=Wolfcub2000,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uyR21lrr,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2017-12-28T01:23:19.349+0000)
>
> I would think grown ups know when to use a term and when not to..... but -shrugs- to each their own :)

Grown ups use the word slut and whore pretty often if you ever take a step in a work place with blue collars, try it out sometime. If you can't allow your player base to use BASIC LANGUAGE to commence banter other than: "Lol gg u did a really good play dude, but your breath smells very negatively." then there is no point in wasting time even trying to participate with the community.

I am a young adult (younger than 24) and even in my age group people don't use that language. I work in a career job that would be considered "blue collar".

Racial slurs, or sexist slurs like the ones you just referenced, are not "basic language". It is, in fact, a sign of immaturity when someone must attack unalterable features of another person simply because they cannot find a better way to express their opinions.

> [{quoted}](name=Chermorg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uyR21lrr,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-28T01:32:20.065+0000)
>
> I am a young adult (younger than 24) and even in my age group people don't use that language. I work in a career job that would be considered "blue collar".
> 
> Racial slurs, or sexist slurs like the ones you just referenced, are not "basic language". It is, in fact, a sign of immaturity when someone must attack unalterable features of another person simply because they cannot find a better way to express their opinions.

I didn't attack, I was being playful.

When in a blue collar environment people make playful jokes like these all of the time, the difference is that I'm not straight up calling somebody out for having black skin - I'm literally just playing for kicks and jokes, as you can see for the dialog until bottom lane started harassing the shit out of me.

Guess what though - I wasn't toxic. You know what I did? Muted, moved onto the next game. I deserve a fucking COOKIE. So don't make this about an opinion or anything political like that, you know damn well that this has nothing to do with that.

You were toxic. You chose to use a racially disparaging term (hate speech) in place of any other of a long list of terms you could've used.

If you honestly think racial and sexist slurs or other hate speech is a joke, I am afraid I cannot help you. That is a larger issue that extends beyond just League. Maybe this punishment will get you to understand that **hate speech is not and never will be a joke**.

> [{quoted}](name=Chermorg,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uyR21lrr,comment-id=0002000000000000000000000001,timestamp=2017-12-28T01:58:26.134+0000)
>
> You were toxic. You chose to use a racially disparaging term (hate speech) in place of any other of a long list of terms you could've used.
> 
> If you honestly think racial and sexist slurs or other hate speech is a joke, I am afraid I cannot help you. That is a larger issue that extends beyond just League. Maybe this punishment will get you to understand that **hate speech is not and never will be a joke**.

Hate speech is speech which attacks a person or group on the basis of attributes such as race, religion, ethnic origin, sexual orientation, disability, or gender. Nobody is being attacked in this clip.

What you say: "Hey, what's up %%%%%?" to a friend = hate speech to you. That's pretty extreme. But no, I'm not learning anything from this - if anything it actually makes me want to be toxic.

> [{quoted}](name=Subject 5,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uyR21lrr,comment-id=00020000000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2017-12-28T02:06:37.558+0000)
>
> Hate speech is speech which attacks a person or group on the basis of attributes such as race, religion, ethnic origin, sexual orientation, disability, or gender. Nobody is being attacked in this clip.
> 
> What you say: "Hey, what's up %%%%%?" to a friend = hate speech to you. That's pretty extreme. But no, I'm not learning anything from this - if anything it actually makes me want to be toxic.

If you seriously can't tell the difference between saying something like that to a friend and saying it to a random stranger online...

Please reread your commentaries. You can not even stop yourself. Do you have any self control? Can you make a comment that does not have cursing? Please try it sometime. 

In almost every game i know of, racial commentaries in public chat areas (in game, and lobbies.... club chats and private chats are different. Unless there is harrassment then you should just remove them and block them.) Are unacceptable and lead to mutes or bans. Real life, theres this thing called "Human Resources" as well as you could end up burning more bridges by not acting professional.

In your group they may cuss a lot. That does not mean in any way that it is smiled upon and appriciated.

Much appriciated. Good bye.

> [{quoted}](name=Wolfcub2000,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uyR21lrr,comment-id=0002000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-28T01:45:23.334+0000)
>
> Please reread your commentaries. You can not even stop yourself. Do you have any self control? Can you make a comment that does not have cursing? Please try it sometime. 
> 
> In almost every game i know of, racial commentaries in public chat areas (in game, and lobbies.... club chats and private chats are different. Unless there is harrassment then you should just remove them and block them.) Are unacceptable and lead to mutes or bans. Real life, theres this thing called "Human Resources" as well as you could end up burning more bridges by not acting professional.
> 
> In your group they may cuss a lot. That does not mean in any way that it is smiled upon and appriciated.
> 
> Much appriciated. Good bye.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fjWC0qi2cMk
There are appropriate places for such language though. Among people you know it is one thing, but in a public place with people you don't know... nah dude. Just don't use racial slurs.
Oh yeah it will totally not have any consequences to throw around racial slurs at your workplace.

"haha grown ups say this stuff so why can't we do it in a game with younger people"

Because we're not here to cuss like sailors to impress others like the people you just described in my high school, college, and job.

Like this?

http://content.answcdn.com/main/content/img/amg/games/drg200/g205/g20521f31g9.jpg
I bet (if it is an online game) if you are excessively harassing and offensive, they ban you from that as well.
I don't know if it has online but I believe they did make a playboy game that gives you the option to just grab the girls' asses and it gets you kicked out.

That's kinda the general idea. If you want to use racial slurs, then this game isn't for you.

That picture you posted doesn't appear to have Shaco on either team.

> [{quoted}](name=Periscope,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uyR21lrr,comment-id=000200000001,timestamp=2017-12-28T01:29:56.814+0000)
>
> That's kinda the general idea. If you want to use racial slurs, then this game isn't for you.
> 
> That picture you posted doesn't appear to have Shaco on either team.

Actually I noticed that just now. Unfortunately I don't even see the game that this is from, it isn't even in my match history as far as I can see. And OPGG is not working properly for me. In the last 20 games I've really only played 2 Eve games, a little confused now.

This looks to be the one to which you're referring. It doesn't really affect your punishment though. Interestingly, this game is from 16 days ago. And you just now got the message about your ban? 

https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2668233893/209595773?tab=overview

> [{quoted}](name=Periscope,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uyR21lrr,comment-id=00020000000100000000,timestamp=2017-12-28T01:40:40.203+0000)
>
> This looks to be the one to which you're referring. It doesn't really affect your punishment though. Interestingly, this game is from 16 days ago. And you just now got the message about your ban? 
> 
> https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2668233893/209595773?tab=overview

Ah, yeah - it looks like that is the one. I just remember that me and bottom lane were joking in lobby about the word %%%%%. Maybe I was mixing up the memories, because honestly I remember playing with this group being very pleasant and nice actually. Like the bottom lane actually got my humor.

But yeah, I just now logged on and got the message :P not sure what's up with that.
pretty sure the community will appreciate if you go find another game to play if this is your attitude about racial slurs

> [{quoted}](name=Subject 5,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uyR21lrr,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-12-28T01:21:19.471+0000)
>
> I think it's about time I find a grown up game then, for grown ups to play, with an older populace.

Lol I'm 44..I would report you for the word as well.

Riot is retarded for banning people for saying the n word, because it really isn't offensive they only use bots to ban. The bots don't even look at the context of how it was used. Retarded af... Also it's freedom of speech and you can say whatever you want, if somebody is offended mute them. Also %%%%% is even racist, the hard r is.

> [{quoted}](name=Namitu,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uyR21lrr,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-12-28T01:40:57.715+0000)
>

Also it's freedom of speech and you can say whatever you want, if somebody is offended mute them. Also %%%%% is even racist, the hard r is.

The thing is: The game is boring.

I fucking NEED this to make the game work and be enjoyable for me. I can't play this game like a good guy robot that poo poos out rainbows from my pee pee hole, I need to make this game fun for me. I know that this is a bot that suspended me, but honestly, why? I'm max rank (was) honor level and if you look at my history in games: I'm usually never toxic.

> [{quoted}](name=Subject 5,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uyR21lrr,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-12-28T01:46:12.794+0000)

I know that this is a bot that suspended me, but honestly, why? I'm max rank (was) honor level and if you look at my history in games: I'm usually never toxic.

'I need to say %%%%% to make a game fun'

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/888/204/3f2.jpg

I know that this is a bot that suspended me, but honestly, why? I'm max rank (was) honor level and if you look at my history in games: I'm usually never toxic.

Keep being a baby and whining about your teams then. The choice is yours. Permaban or play the game like a man who doesn't bitch and moan about everything that doesn't go his way. Up to you. Some people love complaining and there's nothing really inherently wrong with that. It's just unfortunate for you that it's against the rules in this game. If its just social shit that you need, i recommend being social then. Get off your computer if you yearn for social interaction.

> [{quoted}](name=Namitu,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uyR21lrr,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-12-28T01:40:57.715+0000)
>

Also it's freedom of speech and you can say whatever you want, if somebody is offended mute them. Also %%%%% is even racist, the hard r is.

Freedom of speech is about protection from the government. Please don't throw that term around like it means you're immune to any backlash for the things you say. I do encourage you to learn about it though, as well as all of our rights, because they are constantly under attack and it's important to understand and defend them.

> [{quoted}](name=Telephone Booth,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uyR21lrr,comment-id=00030002,timestamp=2017-12-28T04:37:48.965+0000)

I do encourage you to learn about it though, as well as all of our rights, because they are constantly under attack and it's important to understand and defend them.

stfu

> [{quoted}](name=Namitu,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uyR21lrr,comment-id=000300020000,timestamp=2018-01-14T18:40:21.829+0000)
>
> stfu

No sir.
Telling someone to "stfu" because they corrected you. Such maturity.
Freedom of speech only protects you from government action against you. It does not protect you from private entities' actions.

> [{quoted}](name=Namitu,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uyR21lrr,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-12-28T01:40:57.715+0000)
>
> Riot is retarded for banning people for saying the n word, because it really isn't offensive they only use bots to ban. The bots don't even look at the context of how it was used. Retarded af... Also it's freedom of speech and you can say whatever you want, if somebody is offended mute them. Also %%%%% is even racist, the hard r is.

https://imgs.xkcd.com/comics/free_speech.png

In case you need it further explained.
It's like every comment that makes no sense bundled into one. A true piece of art!
League is not USA. You have no freedom of anything. And it is racist.
Its a racist comment whether it was said in a negative way to/at/about someone or not.

Man my wife would have a field day with you. And not in a good way either. Lemme ask ya man, are you black? If not, did you have a black friend who gave you a pass? Even if they did, that doesn't mean you can just run around saying it. In a game setting, no matter how mature, no company will accept racial slurs being thrown around at strangers.

In a work environment, you aren't going to run around using that word least you find yourself in the fast lane to unemployment. 

You can't just go saying things like that because you want to, that isn't how the world works. I'm a white guy, 30 years old, with a black wife. You gain an interesting perspective on life married to someone of another race. 

Let me see if I can say it like she did. That particular word, was used as a form of oppression during the slave period. It was used to demean and bring down the spirit of our dark skinned brothers and sisters. Their use of it now, is their way of taking it as their own. For another race to use it, is equivalent of making it appear as if they (black people) are still worth as much as they were back then.

Again, can't remember everything correctly about what she said, but the point remains is that it isn't okay to be throwing it around, especially so if your reasoning is that the game is boring and it is your way of making it exciting. 

You aren't making the game exciting... You're just being a racist ass.

Lol I don't think you should use the boondocks as a reference. You say "even" boondocks made fun of it, as if the boondocks is a fucking kid show. It's adult humor, made for adults. (Well, probably targets teens too, but hell, I was watching porn as a teen, and that's obviously not supposed to be targeted at teens) what I'm saying is, it's an edgy show. In game, under Riots rules, I don't know why you would think being edgy is safe. Maybe you should play a grown up game like you said, or you know, not play games at all if you're so grown up.

You really gotta learn to determine what is appropriate to say in what environments. That hood shit isn't popular everywhere. It may be in your environment, but when you step out of your environment (i.e. into Riot PC land) you have to adjust.

Anyways, now you know. All you gotta do is not use that one term (I'm sure you know the other terms you can't use, but you don't seem to be about using hate speech, you just love that ghetto talk). Just think of it as a learning experience and come back exactly the same, minus one word. If you're too bitter over this, I would totally understand. I've been banned on these forums for some real stupid shit, and it's hard not to be bitter. But it's just a forum, idc. If it was in game bans, then I'd be pissed.
The word is N 1 G G A

> [{quoted}](name=Subject 5,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=uyR21lrr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-28T01:16:20.769+0000)
>
> The word is N 1 G G A

Lol ya I kept seeing the "%%%%%" and I'm like how is this guy confused? Then yeah... I realized what the word is.
